name: insert time
on / off
format:
<!-- intelligent buton -->
<!--   defines a litte black rectangle-->
<md-button class="vibrate filled touched bigfont rounded" style="background-color:#1AAAFF" ng-click="send({payload: msg.payload })"> 
	<!--   defines svg element -->
	<svg  width="100%" height="90px" viewBox="0 0 800 200">
		<g id="Button_Long">  
			<rect fill="#1AAAFF" width="800" height="200"/>
			
			<g ng-style="{fill: (msg.payload || 0) ? 'green' : 'red'}">
				<rect width="800" height="200" rx="80" ry="80"/>
			</g>

			<g ng-style="{fill: (msg.payload || 0) ? '#AAFFAA' : '#CCCCFF'  }">
				<rect x="11" y="10" width="778" height="180" rx="90" ry="90"/>
			</g>

			<g ng-style="{fill: (msg.payload || 0) ? 'green' : 'red'}">    
				<text x="400" y="125" style="text-anchor:middle"  font-weight="bold" font-size="80" font-family="Arial">{{(msg.payload||0)? " on " : "  off  "}} </text>
			</g> 
			
		</g>
  </svg>
</md-button>
